Mark Fields, the CEO of Ford Motor Company, praised Donald Trump for working to restore American manufacturing after a meeting at the White House. Fields also praised Trumps decision to kill former President Obamas  Partnership trade deal.
False

Chris Cuomo insulted network contributor Mary Katharine Ham by calling her cheap. Ham responded: I am a person, single mom of two, who has lost three or four plans.

Researchers are testing Stryker infantry transport vehicles mounted with a 5kW laser weapon so that one day, the weapon can destroy drones on the front lines. The laser weapon brought down 50 drones during a   firing exercise. Other branches of the military also plan to utilize laser weapons.
False

Senator Tom Cotton predicted that Judge Neil Gorsuch will be confirmed to the Supreme Court before the Senate breaks at the end of next week. He added that he hasnt given up hope that at least eight Democrats will support Gorsuchs nomination. If there is a filibuster Republicans will do what we must to put Neil Gorsuch on the Supreme court.
False
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Politico reports on internal clashes within the Trump administration between Trump    Jared Kushner and chief strategist Steve Bannon.
False
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Breitbart editor MILO and former pharmaceutical executive Martin Shkreli will lead a rally this afternoon on UC Davis campus. Last nights event was cancelled after protesters became violent. Several protesters were caught by cameras attacking reporters and throwing barricades. The Davis College Republicans canceled tonights event featuring Breitbart columnist Milo Yiannopoulos.
False
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Cincinnati Bengals cornerback Adam Pacman Jones was arrested Monday night on multiple charges. Pacman has a lengthy history of arrests over his long career, missing the entire 2007 season and half of 2008 for   incidents.

ISIS has reportedly developed high powered explosives that can be hidden inside laptops and are entirely undetectable by regular airport scanners. The US government believes that sophisticated new bombs could be concealed within laptop computers and may be much harder to detect by traditional airport security scanners.

Senate Minority Leader Chuck Schumer fought back tears as he vowed to do everything he can to overturn President Donald Trumps executive order. Schumer said, This executive order was mean spirited and  . He added, It must be reversed immediately.

TMZ reports that a source who was at a small gathering last month with Clinton and some politically connected people from New York said the former presidential candidate has not ruled out the possibility and is taking a real look at it. Rumors of Clinton running for mayor to resurrect her political career have been swirling around in New York political circles since the beginning of the year.
False
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Senator Angus King argued that Russian interference in the 2016 election is the most serious attack on the United States since September 11th, and that Attorney General Jeff Sessions doesnt seem very interested in it. King said, The other thing that was troubling though, that didnt get as much publicity, I asked him [Sessions] did you ever get a briefing on the    what the Russians did? Did you seek a briefing? DidYou ask about it? And he said, no,

The Kelloggs Snacks Plant in Seelyville, IN is participating in the #DumpKelloggs boycott. Company officials announced in August of 2016 that the plant will cease work, leaving 150 people out of a job. Officials expect it to be completely closed by September.

Bulletstorm: Full Clip Edition includes all of the DLC released for the original game, a new game mode, and new challenge maps. Players can also now play through the story campaign as Duke Nukem. The game will be released on April 7 on Xbox One, Playstation 4, and PC.

Democrats are boycotting confirmation hearings, refusing to work with Republicans on Obamacare and pondering a filibuster of President Donald Trumps Supreme Court pick. But as Democrats throw every procedural hurdle they can think of at Trump, theyre facing a bleak reality: they have virtually no power in Washington.

House Minority Leader Nancy Pelosi accidentally referred to President Donald Trump as former President George W. Bush. Pelosi then said she prayed Bush was president again.
